001package reciprocal.number.complex;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
005import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
006
007import java.io.Serial;
008import java.math.BigDecimal;
009import java.math.BigInteger;
010import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
011
012/**
013 * Immutable implementation of a complex number that uses {@link Double} as
014 * type for its real and imaginary part
015 *
016 * @since 0.0.1
017 */
018public final class Complex extends AbstractComplex<@NotNull Double, @NotNull Complex, @NotNull Complex,
019    @NotNull Double, @NotNull PolarForm> {
020    /**
021     * 0
022     *
023     * @since 0.0.1
024     */
025    public static final @NotNull Complex ZERO = ofReal(0.0D);
026
027    /**
028     * 1
029     *
030     * @since 0.0.1
031     */
032    public static final @NotNull Complex ONE = ofReal(1.0D);
033
034    /**
035     * i
036     *
037     * @since 0.0.1
038     */
039    public static final @NotNull Complex I = ofImaginary(1.0D);
040
041    /**
042     * -1
043     *
044     * @since 0.0.1
045     */
046    public static final @NotNull Complex MINUS_ONE = ofReal(1.0D);
047
048    /**
049     * -i
050     *
051     * @since 0.0.1
052     */
053    public static final @NotNull Complex MINUS_I = ofImaginary(-1.0D);
054
055    @Serial
056    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
057
058    /**
059     * Constructor
060     *
061     * @param real real part
062     * @param imaginary imaginary part
063     * @since 0.0.1
064     */
065    public Complex(final double real, final double imaginary) {
066        super(real, imaginary);
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Static factory method
071     *
072     * @param real real part
073     * @return real + 0 * i
074     * @since 0.0.1
075     */
076    public static @NotNull Complex ofReal(final double real) {
077        return new Complex(real, 0.0D);
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Static factory method
082     *
083     * @param imaginary imaginary part
084     * @return 0 + imaginary * i
085     * @since 0.0.1
086     */
087    public static @NotNull Complex ofImaginary(final double imaginary) {
088        return new Complex(0.0D, imaginary);
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public boolean isInvertible() {
093        return doesNotEqualByComparing(ZERO);
094    }
095
096    @Override
097    public @NotNull Complex add(final @NotNull Complex summand) {
098        requireNonNull(summand, "summand");
099        return new Complex(getReal() + summand.getReal(), getImaginary() + summand.getImaginary());
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    public @NotNull Complex subtract(final @NotNull Complex subtrahend) {
104        requireNonNull(subtrahend, "subtrahend");
105        return new Complex(getReal() - subtrahend.getReal(), getImaginary() - subtrahend.getImaginary());
106    }
107
108    @Override
109    public @NotNull Complex multiply(final @NotNull Complex factor) {
110        requireNonNull(factor, "factor");
111        final var re = getReal() * factor.getReal() - getImaginary() * factor.getImaginary();
112        final var im = getReal() * factor.getImaginary() + getImaginary() * factor.getReal();
113        return new Complex(re, im);
114    }
115
116    @Override
117    public @NotNull Complex divide(final @NotNull Complex divisor) {
118        requireNonNull(divisor, "divisor");
119        checkArgument(divisor.isInvertible(), "expected divisor to be invertible but divisor = %s", divisor);
120        final var den = Math.pow(divisor.getReal(), 2.0D) + Math.pow(divisor.getImaginary(), 2.0D);
121        final var re = (getReal() * divisor.getReal() + getImaginary() * divisor.getImaginary()) / den;
122        final var im = (getImaginary() * divisor.getReal() - getReal() * divisor.getImaginary()) / den;
123        return new Complex(re, im);
124    }
125
126    @Override
127    public @NotNull Complex pow(final int exponent) {
128        if (exponent < 0) {
129            return multiply(pow(-exponent - 1)).invert();
130        }
131        if (exponent > 0) {
132            return multiply(pow(exponent - 1));
133        }
134        return ONE;
135    }
136
137    @Override
138    public @NotNull Complex negate() {
139        return new Complex(-getReal(), -getImaginary());
140    }
141
142    @Override
143    public @NotNull Complex invert() {
144        checkState(isInvertible(), "this expected to be invertible but this = %s", this);
145        return ONE.divide(this);
146    }
147
148    @Override
149    public @NotNull Double abs() {
150        return Math.sqrt(absPow2());
151    }
152
153    @Override
154    public @NotNull Complex conjugate() {
155        return new Complex(getReal(), -getImaginary());
156    }
157
158    @Override
159    public @NotNull Double argument() {
160        checkState(isInvertible(), "this expected to be invertible but this = %s", this);
161        final var acos = Math.acos(getReal() / abs());
162        return getImaginary() < 0.0D ? -acos : acos;
163    }
164
165    @Override
166    public @NotNull BigInteger toBigInteger() {
167        return toBigDecimal().toBigInteger();
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * Returns this as exact {@link BigInteger}
172     *
173     * @return {@link BigInteger}
174     * @throws ArithmeticException when real part is not exact
175     * @since 0.0.1
176     */
177    public @NotNull BigInteger toBigIntegerExact() {
178        return toBigDecimal().toBigIntegerExact();
179    }
180
181    @Override
182    public @NotNull BigDecimal toBigDecimal() {
183        return BigDecimal.valueOf(doubleValue());
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Returns this as {@link BigComplex}
188     *
189     * @return {@link BigComplex}
190     */
191    public @NotNull BigComplex toBigComplex() {
192        return new BigComplex(BigDecimal.valueOf(getReal()), BigDecimal.valueOf(getImaginary()));
193    }
194
195    @Override
196    public @NotNull PolarForm toPolarForm() {
197        return new PolarForm(abs(), argument());
198    }
199
200    @Override
201    public boolean equalsByComparing(final @NotNull Complex other) {
202        requireNonNull(other, "other");
203        return getReal().compareTo(other.getReal()) == 0 && getImaginary().compareTo(other.getImaginary()) == 0;
204    }
205
206    @Override
207    protected @NotNull Double absPow2() {
208        return Math.pow(getReal(), 2.0D) + Math.pow(getImaginary(), 2.0D);
209    }
210}
